website_summaries.verdict: Price is surprisingly low for a hamburger patty press that contains high quality materials.
pros: Uses food grade aluminum, so you can trust the quality of the hardware
Ships with 100 parchment papers to prevent sticking, so it offers a very good value
You even can place the base of the press directly on your grill, if you’d rather roast the hamburger
cons: Not much versatility, as it only makes one-quarter pound burgers

customer_reviews.title: Where's the beef?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy product--I like the simplicity of it. Positives include no mess clean up and sturdy construction. Negatives include not having adequate over-sized wax paper included (can be purchased separately), also the knob on top is difficult to press with force. The product could be improved by making the patty size 6" instead of 4"--the burgers shrink so much that we just use slider buns. It is nice to be able to press a whole bunch of patties and freeze them in bags with serving size bunches. The patties remain thin enough that if they are frozen or partially frozen, they can still be fully cooked with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this item
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this item. It came with Non-Stick wax papers and made me so happy. The item is produced so good I guess your guests will be pleased to see your burgers made by this. I'm using it at home and my friends were impressed of it. You can unscrew the handle and can fit in a slim drawer doesn't take any space. Every house needs one. Well this one from this seller don't forget wax paper comes with it. Thank you so much and arrived to turkey less than a week. Thank you so much. I guess making burgers was never this good before.
customer_reviews.author: Ebru Cavuldar

customer_reviews.title: Great patty-whacker
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use, solid aluminum, seems like it will stand up for a long time. Both parts are ridged so your hamburger patties will be ridged on both sides. Makes a patty exactly 4 1/2" across. The included wax paper makes it very easy to create your patties for immediate use or storage, because of the paper the meat releases from the bottom section with just a couple of upside-down shakes, and does not stick to the sides. Also easy to clean. A good, simple product.
customer_reviews.author: FordMandalay

customer_reviews.title: I want to like the unit because I cook lots of hamburgers of 93-96% Lean Ground Prime
customer_reviews.text: After using this press I'm less than excited about its performance. Especially when it comes to getting the meat to release from the base. I've used PAM and other assorted baking sprays to assist with the meat releasing and being a Stroke patient with only 1 dependable arm its rather difficult But I'm not a quitter so I just spray each time before I place the wax paper then when removing the meat It seems to help it release a bit easier. If I'm doing something wrong would someone please tell me I'm always seeking a way to work Smarter NOT Harder!
customer_reviews.author: Wil Engle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gem. I did as one previous customer suggested and used a paper on th bottom and one on top. The popped right out. Did seven pounds of hamburgers and then froze the, on cookie sheet, then vacuum sealed into packages of four.
customer_reviews.author: gotogal44

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. The added paper rounds and overall durability make this the perfect press. I purchased this to form sausage for bagel sandwichs, and it performs like a dream. I would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the third burger
customer_reviews.text: The handle of the press broke on the THIRD burger. I've used it once more since then without a handle so of course its clunky and more difficult to use than it should be. Specifically, it's a bit hard to remove the lid and a bit difficult to get the burger out. But it's a breeze to clean. Also, the grill lines are pretty awesome. Too bad it wasn't quality enough construction to be the press for me. And too bad I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a family member who is TERRIBLE at shaping hamburger patties. We had a good laugh and they use it now. Nice packaging and looks like it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SMarley

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy, but it gets the job done right!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with the included wax paper circles. It would be a pain in the butt to use without them. I’ve made 1/4# and 1/3# patties, works great for both. Easy to clean, I hand wash it. My 12 son loves to help out when I am using it, he can pound out the patties as effortlessly as I can. A+ on the engineering of this very convenient tool.
customer_reviews.author: matthew rauls

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the griller-in-chief and asked for a burger press. I chose this based on reviews, and he loves it. Good size, well-made -- does the job. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convenient. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just the right size. Burgers are more consistent in size and density know that I have this. The wax paper rounds that come with it are great. I just wish the bottom was removable some how. This way I could spread the meat out on a sheet pan lined with wax paper and use it like a cookie cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Kleiner

customer_reviews.title: Consistent burger patties!
customer_reviews.text: Using this no-stick patty maker has dramatically improved the eating experience of hamburgers. The patty maker helps produce a burger of consistent thickness, ensuring a consistent preparation. After pressing the patty, the meat is extracted very easily without any components sticking to the metal. Washing is a breeze. Well worth the modest investment.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.S. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for prepping burgers to put in the freezer. Works well, as long as you do not forget to use the wax paper both on top and on bottom—otherwise the meat sticks quite a bit. Makes a good sized burger. Fairly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bradley

customer_reviews.title: very high quality and super duty.
customer_reviews.text: i love using this thing it is very well made and easy to use. i grill out usually twice a week depending on the weather if it is too cold or really rainy i wont grill out but if i do make burgers inside i will be usinhg it the meat does not stick to the inside like i would of thought and it is very easy to use and clean. i like that i can remove the handle to make it more compact
customer_reviews.author: yanko ban

customer_reviews.title: Well made, one small issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, heavy duty burger press with one inexpensive, simple modification. The screw-in handle is not flush to the top press. This creates a weak spot and an area where cleaning could become an issue. 3 stainless steel washers (.12¢) and issue fixed. Using precut papers makes this item perfect. I'm not certain if this flaw is just my press or if others have the same issue. 4 stars based on flaw in this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Navyvette

customer_reviews.title: Makes the perfect burger
customer_reviews.text: I've never made homemade burgers because I always thought it was too much work but this makes it so easy! I love how i can adjust the thickness of it because my husband likes really thick burgers but i perfer just 2 thinner patties. I love the papers that come with it too! I can make multiple and not have them stick together. Ever since I've had this I've only made homemade burgers and my family loves it. I also pre made some and froze them and since the papers helped prevent them from sticking, it was very easy to take out the freezer and cook. The burgers still tasted delicious 😊
customer_reviews.author: alexis smith

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to remove meat from press
customer_reviews.text: I thought the hamburger press was hollow when I ordered it. It kind of looked that way in the picture. t is very hard to get the patties out of the press unless you spray it with cooking spray every time it is used after every patty. I used to have one from tupperware that worked much better!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Lady 2

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: I love making burgers. But I am TERRIBLE at making patties by hand. Mine always come out too fat in the beginning and shrink horribly while cooking. I bought this to remedy that and it has made my life 10x easier. The patties are the perfect size. They cook wonderfully. It's easy to use. And it comes with 100 papers which is great for keeping the patties from sticking together. I stocked my deep freezer with several packages of pre made burger patties and it was a breeze to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the parchment papers they provided because I season each burger individually so they were a little tough to remove but for the most part held together. Much easier and more uniform patties than when I do them by hand and it makes grilling less of a hassle. It didn't come with cleaning instructions and I was afraid the dishwasher might pit them so I washed them by hand.
customer_reviews.author: maryannd

customer_reviews.title: Great Press
customer_reviews.text: This hamburger press makes my burgers perfect every time. And I know hamburgers. Probably better than anybody, believe me. No one knows more about hamburgers than me, and this press is the perfect compliment to my hamburger greatnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Simply effective
customer_reviews.text: I thought I did this already. Accepts 1/4 lb, 1/2 lb, 1/3 lb, 1/8 lb (those are pretty thin.) Cleans easily. Less clean-up if using waxed paper squares that extend up the side. Disks fit neatly into vacuum sealer bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesey Juryrigger

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: As my husband would say this is the WORST purchase he had ever made for a kitchen gadget. If you goal is to make your life easier while making burgers. This isn’t what you are looking for. It takes longer to make a patty with this tool rather than by hand. All it does it make it a circle, then it’s basicially stuck inside of the plate. Save yourself the energy and buy a plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Just one negative....
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is that the handle was useless to me. I had to push the top down without the handle.
customer_reviews.author: R.Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Perfect burgers every time. I used to just make them by hand but this keeps everything more uniform. Great for 1/4 lb burgers. If you're someone that makes a lot of burgers at a time I'd recommend getting an extra pack of wax papers. If not the ones that come with it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Burger lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Mom who loves to feed grandsons with healthier version of the "fast-food" burgers. She loves it, prepares the slides in advance and freezes the burgers. Most importantly, kids are happy having opportunity to eat "restaurant-like" burgers at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kasha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not what the advertisement says - the burger sticks to the form so you have to peel the meat out & shape into patty again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right size papers for this press!
customer_reviews.text: The press works great. Hardest part is ordering the right papers to use. The ones from the same maker don’t fit. They are too big. Most burger presses use 4.5 inch paper. This one actually uses 11cm papers. If you search for 11cm hamburger papers they are on here.
customer_reviews.author: cosmic charlie

customer_reviews.title: Unit does not fit well together
customer_reviews.text: Hand wash only the two parts do not fit together allows a small gap around the edges Unit does not fit well together, food will squeeze out around the edge. Even with the use of paper pressed food is difficult to remove
customer_reviews.author: dan cope

customer_reviews.title: Sticky stuff
customer_reviews.text: Like: metallic and very easy to use. Dislike: The patties tend to get stuck on the surfaces, so it becomes a challenge to remove the patty without it breaking apart. I have to spray oil on the surface with the hope of it not sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Anandale

customer_reviews.title: Use to make big burgers
customer_reviews.text: Make big burgers. Hard to get it out of the container without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of weight to this press and helped formed burgers ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of weight to this press and helped formed burgers much easier than doing it by hand. Also leaves my hands much cleaner. Formed consistent patties. Fills the entirity of the burger.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little hamburger press. It comes with precut wax paper, which makes it easy to lift out burger after pressing it. Of course, you can use your own waxed paper once you run out of the included precut ones.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: good basic patty press
customer_reviews.text: my family and I have been using this patty press for a little while now since we bought it its a good sturdy press and works well we put a piece of aluminum foil (i use scissors to cut to size) on the bottom to keep the meat from sticking. It works well for our family of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: MAKES PERFECT BURGERS!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gizmo. Nothing fancy or automated. Just scoop the ground beef into it and press. Turn it over and the perfect burger falls out ready for the freezer or the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Mschloe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patty
customer_reviews.text: This press makes the perfect patty! Get your self some extra wax paper as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bouch

customer_reviews.title: Great Press!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. No more burgers falling apart on the grill. Even my 7 year old can make well packed patties now and the fact that it's dishwasher safe is even better. Get extra papers if you can.
customer_reviews.author: KelleySquared

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it's nice that it comes with wax paper circles for dividers
customer_reviews.author: D G

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper weight.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much impossible to get hamburger out of the thing after it’s pressed.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought burger presses would be a waste of money. But, my local grocer had a great deal on ground beef and figured I'd grab one of these and make a bunch of patties up. Wow. It really helps. Keeps the meat packed firm and nice even shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good for sliders
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy thus makes preparing hamburgers; however, the burgers are really small when cooked using 80/20 (lean/fat content) ground beef.
customer_reviews.author: smaybury

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Seems funny to be rating something as simple as a hamburger press and I have had man over the years. This one is the best I've ever owned. It looks great, easy to clean, makes the perfect thickness. I will be ordering more for gifts in the future. One hint, order more papers, they are cheap and easy to go through them since you use two per burger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable hamburger press
customer_reviews.text: Great hamburger press, wax paper is only to be used if you refrigerating or freezing burgers other than that press them and throw them on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple gadget that works.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. You need to use a piece of plastic wrap on the bottom to get the patties out easily. Other than that it's nice and sturdy. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LiMa

customer_reviews.title: Not nonstick!  I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: It is not nonstick. I had to add spray. Patties still fall apart! The design doesn't really make much sense either. I do not recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I bought this to help make more rounded burgers then hand patties and always shrinking. It works good but you definitely need the papers that come with it, otherwise it usually sticks
customer_reviews.author: musiclovinggirl16

customer_reviews.title: Product could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Works well ,however, even w/the wax paper inserts to prevent patty from sticking to the press, the meat clings to the sides when pressed and still has to be cut out of the press. Don't use it as often as I would b/c of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: kelly barras

customer_reviews.title: Future Chef
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 9 year old grandson who lives to help in kitchen.. He loved it!! Meat was sticking so I suggested he spray it with Zpam spray!!👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: sandra W.

customer_reviews.title: My old cheap plastic burger  patty Press did a better job than the metal press.
customer_reviews.text: The “ non-stick” burger press did everything right except non-stick. I used Ground beef 73/27 and ground chuck 80/20 and both stuck to the top and bottom press. I used two different types of non-stick spray to aid in the process and neither helped. I also went as far as oiling the top and bottom then heating them in an over to season the metal with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make hamburgers
customer_reviews.text: This simple press is a great way to make perfect consistent patties. Use it for beef, chicken, sausage or turkey. Works great and is easy to use and clean. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Gimshewicz

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that the item came without instructions. In particular, how much meat should go into the press. It’s been true and error
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great burger press!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent burger press. It's easy to remove the patties after they are pressed. Cleaning it is also simple. It's well made and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe White

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for making any burger or people who eat pork sausage for breakfast. I dont eat pork sausage but would be handy for any type of meat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I fed 17 people with hamburgers. Everyone thought the patties were frozen and store bought but tasted much better. I really got tired of making my own inconsistent patties. This is faster, easier, and uniform. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Makes great hamburgers.
customer_reviews.text: It make great hamburger. They also huge. I bought 1.25 pounds and it made 3. The great thing about this is the hamburgers don't fall appart.
customer_reviews.author: Bebo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient patty maker
customer_reviews.text: This makes some damn big burgers. Seems the patties are bigger than the patties you'd pick up at the grocery store - not a bad thing at all, just be a big hungrier.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Koval

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really makes nice consistent patties that grill up well. Need a waxed paper slip on the bottom for them to come out easily, but as long as you're making patties to use fresh and not freezing them you can use the same paper over and over on a batch.
customer_reviews.author: bsteenson

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect HB-Patty
customer_reviews.text: I received and used this 7/14 and I was definitely impressed! I have to get use to exactly how much to use but all in all, my patties turned out great and they didn't puff up like they normally do! Definitely worth getting!! And I can't wait for our next burger night so I can use it again!
customer_reviews.author: MrsSliman316

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patties
customer_reviews.text: I used it already and it works! I used the wax paper that comes with it on both sides...it was quick and made perfect patties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Makes decent quarter-pound patties. I suggest buying some precut patty papers to store burgers for any time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This burger press works very well for beef patties, but for some reason turkey patties seem to stick and then were easily burned. I will try it again, maybe it is user error? All in all it is a nice sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: averageman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are using that a lot. It's a great choice for hamburger lovers that want to eat healthy one at home. And it's really worked for my kids that always want to whine about the food.
customer_reviews.author: Nasman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item !
customer_reviews.text: Just made 50 hamburgers for a party, and this worked so well. The liners are a perfect fit and made it so easy to handle the burgers. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: David W. Beier

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. When you run out of the wax paper circles it’s easy to cut yourself more if you save one as a template. Burgers are usually 5-5.5 oz when packed to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Hisgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great food prep item.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Simple to use, simply to clean, inexpensive. Best food prep aid I've purchased in decades.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McClure

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and makes perfect burgers. Don’t over stuff, and they will come out of the press easy.
customer_reviews.author: ashley s

customer_reviews.title: Diameter is too small
customer_reviews.text: The diameter of this press is too small. When using 80% beef, you end up with thick, slider sized burgers. It would also be nice if this press would indent the patty so that it wouldn't shrink into a ball when cooking. Overall, nice idea but could use improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect burgers, just have to get your size and amount down pat.
customer_reviews.author: James Gathers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use when making several burgers at once! Cleans up easily in dishwasher top rack once wiped and rinsed in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: **csp**

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great patties, easy to use. Now I can have the kids help out with grilling.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Well built - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great price and gets the job done. All metal construction. We make a lot of veggie burgers and this does the trick vs. hand forming where the sides always would split.
customer_reviews.author: Nirinjan Singh

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Got it damaged very disappointed, literally the lettering was coming off when I was looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Celena

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...youll be glad u bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! So much easier then hand making the patty. Use less or more meat....it always comes out neat and looks professional...just apply even pressure. I use wax paper on both the bottom and top of patty before pressing so there's no fuss with food sticking. Well worth the money...glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Burger Press
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly as described on schedule. Very durable and will make good size patties. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t but this one. Buy one with a press. The handle will snap off so easily. Other than that no complaints. Used it twice and the handle snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Its so thin...not really good to make a good size burger. The equipment itself feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnda Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Yum good bar-b-que
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use. We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Hamburger Press
customer_reviews.text: This press allows me to make thinner burgers. The two separate pieces are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: nora j cromer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Plastic hamburger pressers kept breaking. I found this non-stick product and love it! It is durable, burger meat does not stick; easy to clean. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Clace50

customer_reviews.title: Uniform patties.
customer_reviews.text: The metal doesn’t clean up well, but makes uniform patties.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Addition
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with the parchment paper. Made burger making easier and helped the burger stay together. Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: KB RN

customer_reviews.title: Burger maker
customer_reviews.text: Easy only if you use two pieces of the paper. Take one off before freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond I.

customer_reviews.title: Love making burgers with it
customer_reviews.text: Love making burgers with it good size and thickness only thing I don't like it's kinda hard to get the Patty out of the mold
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for DH for Christmas. We LOVE It. Kept buying premade patties for convenience. Now using fresh ground beef and freezing our own. We do it together and knock it out quickly. Nice the item comes with the things to separate the patties.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: My husband is all for making things easy! Ain’t nothing easier than using this to make burgers we love it !
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Greatest burger party maker
customer_reviews.text: I hated making patties by hand and decided to get something to help. This is quality and great with the papers to keep the burger from sticking.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyintheD

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Burger Press
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good product, would recommend. Well made and easy to use. The included burger paper is appreciated. It’s a bit harder to clean the raw burger gunk that gets stuck on the metal’s rough texture, especially the tight inner corners of the press.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cummings

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. Made patties even and keeps my hands from getting greasy. Easy to use and clean. Love the papers come with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it turned out to be great, non sticky with the patty paper
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be Phenomenal,,, I was hesitant before placing the order,, comparing this to more expensive ones with more reviews,,, but it turned out to be great, non sticky with the patty paper,,, awesome size patty which you can control it's thickness to a degree,, and fast to make patties as well,, I'm surprised folks....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easier way to remove it and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It makes the perfect shaped burger, however is ruined when I try to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and works great! Solid construction, beef won't stick to the surface--I would buy again anyday!
customer_reviews.author: RocketDoc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I was able to make all my hamburgers the same size and they held together great. It is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: shelly lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Every burger gets stuck. You have to shake it to get it out. Not easy to Maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Spease

customer_reviews.title: Fast hamburgers!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves to bbq and making our own hamburger are quick and easy now!
customer_reviews.author: M. Starke

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY! SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: 36 HAMBURGERS! UNIFORM SIZE AND SHAPE! PERFECT PAPERS FOR IN BETWEEN! ALL IN LESS THAN 45 MINUTES. IN THE FREEZER NOW, READY TO GO!
customer_reviews.author: Deb A.

customer_reviews.title: Use as intended (with sheets) - PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and simple. Burgers come out consistent and well formed. Use the sheets that come with it to prevent sticking (so, in other words, use as intended!).
customer_reviews.author: church00

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool for burgers
customer_reviews.text: Love the press. When I make hamburgers I usually do so with my grandchildren. They have a great time using the press making their own burgers and I can make them in advance without sticking together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the money but had to press down really hard to get it to where the burgers pressed and didn't fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: swilmoth86

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect had a plastic one before this one I like it much better, I make 1/3 lb patties.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. The paper works to avoid sticking and it separates well when freezing. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes thinner burgers and this helps a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GWHOLE Non-Stick Burger Press Aluminum Hamburger Patty Maker with 100 Wax Papers for BBQ Grill
feature_bullets: Food-grade aluminum die-cast, pie plate as a whole, the quality is reliable
Simply load the burger maker with meat, fish or a veggie mixture and press down the handle to produce a perfect thick round burger!
Non-stick cast aluminum, 100 free parchment paper included, which makes releasing the burger from the press a breeze, also can be used for BBQ
More than a mold. Can be used as a roast plate and heated on the fire directly
Detachable solid plastic handle saves storage space when going out for picnic or outdoor BBQ
